name: India
interestingFact: India is the world's largest democracy.

name: United States
interestingFact: The U.S. has the world's largest economy.

name: China
interestingFact: China has the largest population in the world.

name: Brazil
interestingFact: Brazil is home to the Amazon Rainforest.

name: Australia

name: Canada

name: United Kingdom
